message.default:
In 2017, Pure Writer launched its first version on Google Play, starting a long "five-year project". During these 5 years, we submitted a total of 10,000 updates, ranging from v1.0 to v23.0.6, in the latest version, we have implemented great functions such as ChatGPT & OneDrive support for Cloud Sync & Smooth Unlimited Words.

Therefore, during 2023.5.23 ~ 2023.5.30, for Workers' Month, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at US$25(tax not included), is discounted to US$16.99(tax not included).
message.zh:
在 2023.5.23 ~ 2023.5.30 期间纯纯写作发布关键的 v23.0 版本，纯纯写作 Pro（永久会员）现提供短期大幅降价优惠！

在纯纯写作 Pro 页面底部可查看最新优惠售价。
